Romelu Lukaku missed FOUR huge chances as Belgium crashed out of the World Cup at the group stage.
Roberto Martinez's men beat 1-0 Canada in their first Group F fixture but then lost out to Morocco,… [+1740 chars]

articles.author: Simon Mullock
articles.title: Neymar's World Cup could be over as fears Brazil star is losing injury battle - The Mirror
articles.description: Paris Saint-Germain forward Neymar will miss the clash with Cameroon this Thursday night and reports from South America suggest he will also be sidelined for his country's bid to reach the quarter-finals next week
articles.content:
Neymar is losing his battle to be fit for Brazil's first knock-out game in the World Cup - and fears are growing that his tournament may be over.
The Paris Saint-Germain forward will miss the clash … [+1511 chars]

articles.author: Alex Reid
articles.title: France TV viewers miss World Cup drama over Griezmann’s disallowed goal - The Guardian
articles.description: Broadcaster TF1 cut to an advert break believing the match against Tunisia had finished 1-1, meaning fans missed a VAR check ruling out a late France strike
articles.content: Many TV viewers in France awoke to a shock on Thursday morning, belatedly discovering that the world champions had lost 1-0 Tunisia having turned off thinking that Antoine Griezmann had levelled the … [+3488 chars]

articles.author: Lewis Winter
articles.title: Everything said about Ben White leaving England World Cup squad with star not returning - Express
articles.description: England will be without Ben White for the remainder of the World Cup.
articles.content:
"The rest of the staff and players were so happy for him. All the credit is down to him and what he's done."
